ModMetaData.name: SoS2 Wreck Deconstruction Addon
ModMetaData.author: M.A.G.Gen.
ModMetaData.description:
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// This addon will allow you to deconstruct your collected ship wrecks just like in 1.2 version (but with some improvements) The experimental version of Save Our Ship 2 can be found here https://github.com/SonicTHI/SaveOurShip2Experimental/archive/refs/heads/main.zip But be careful! Use at your own risk (this is about my mod too, because it's still need some testing)!
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// How to use:
1. Download experimental version of SoS2 2. Launch your ship in space 3. Build salvage bay 4. Go to "ship" tab in your menu. 5. Make self-destrucive deconstruction area for your wreck 6. Deconstruction process will start automaticly
BE CAREFULL!!! You can deconstruct your own ship!
A little remark: Salvage bays deconstruction bots deconstruct only ship parts, and nothing else...
P.S. I am not sure how good this thing will work with standart SoS2 mod, because I don't test it. You can launch it with standart SoS2 mod, but this could break your saves, so make backup...
And yes... That's a bug, because after exiting the game, wreck area, can't be saved (sorry)...
